judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbibri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cubiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: Pee Cubiam,

attorneys: Martin S. Belsky, Assistant District Attorney, with him Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Jordan, Appellant.
Argued April 30, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbibri, JJ.
Robert H. Arronson, for appellant.
Martin S. Belsky, Assistant District Attorney, with him Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 28, 1971:
